definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to see what others fail to see (idiom)/to have exceptional insight
see 獨具隻眼|独具只眼[du2 ju4 zhi1 yan3]

sentences.english: Our products are unique in style and various in color.
sentences.chinese: 公司產品風格獨具，獨樹一幟，花色品種繁多。

sentences.english: The perceptual shape of the light appearing elusively in the dark, a unique charm of optic artistry.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜裏若隱若現的感性造型，獨具光影藝術魅力。

sentences.english: The electric power system of Jiangsu oilfield has its own network and characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇油田的電力系統自成網絡並獨具特點。

sentences.english: Although the buildings here seem old-fashioned, they have a peculiar flavor of their own.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦的建築物看上去老式的，但它們獨具風格。

sentences.english: Wang Shiduo also proposed is characteristic suppresses the population growth the method.
sentences.chinese: 汪士鐸還提出了獨具特色的抑制人口增長的方法。

sentences.english: Unique design, comprihensive top furniture supermarket, leading the new fashion of furniture consumption.
sentences.chinese: 匠心獨具，百貨式高端家居賣場，引領消費新潮流。

sentences.english: Cezanne is known for his unique still life paintings of apples.
sentences.chinese: 賽尚以獨具一格的蘋果靜物畫馳名遐邇。

sentences.english: Unique temperature-controlling mode with four fixed programs.
sentences.chinese: 獨具四段固定程序控制模式。

sentences.english: The Lingbi stone has the cultural connotation which the quite rich and is characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 靈璧石具有極爲豐富而又獨具特色的文化內涵。

sentences.english: When your boss skips a few rules, he'sbeing original.
sentences.chinese: 老闆略過一些禮節，他獨具一格。

sentences.english: Yu Dafu's creative style is very unique in the history of the Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 郁達夫的創作風格在中國新文學史上獨具特色。

sentences.english: Adventure photography has its own set of special challenges.
sentences.chinese: 探險攝影有其獨具有的一系列的挑戰。

sentences.english: He is a very perceptive young man.
sentences.chinese: 他是個獨具慧眼的年輕人。

sentences.english: The Qingdao locates the peninsula south of Shandong to carry, is a seashore city that has special features only.
sentences.chinese: 青島位於山東半島南端，是一座獨具特色的海濱城市。

sentences.english: He used elements from nature to create a unique shape for each bottle of perfume.
sentences.chinese: 他運用自然界的元素讓每款香水瓶的形狀都獨具特色。

sentences.english: Ancient Egyptian stone inscription art has a unique artistic charm in the world.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及石刻藝術在世界上也獨具藝術魅力。
